16  package org.apache.ibatis.cache.decorators;
17  
18  import java.util.HashMap;
19  import java.util.Map;
20  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock;
21  
22  import org.apache.ibatis.cache.Cache;
23  
24  /**
25   * @author Clinton Begin
26   */
27  public class TransactionalCache implements Cache {
28  
29    private Cache delegate;
30    private boolean clearOnCommit;
31    private Map<Object, AddEntry> entriesToAddOnCommit;
32    private Map<Object, RemoveEntry> entriesToRemoveOnCommit;
33  
34    public TransactionalCache(Cache delegate) {
35      this.delegate = delegate;
36      this.clearOnCommit = false;
37      this.entriesToAddOnCommit = new HashMap<Object, AddEntry>();
38      this.entriesToRemoveOnCommit = new HashMap<Object, RemoveEntry>();
39    }
40  
41    @Override
42    public String getId() {
43      return delegate.getId();
44    }
45  
46    @Override
47    public int getSize() {
48      return delegate.getSize();
49    }
50  
51    @Override
52    public Object getObject(Object key) {
53      if (clearOnCommit) return null; // issue #146
54      return delegate.getObject(key);
55    }
56  
57    @Override
58    public ReadWriteLock getReadWriteLock() {
59      return null;
60    }
61  
62    @Override
63    public void putObject(Object key, Object object) {
64      entriesToRemoveOnCommit.remove(key);
65      entriesToAddOnCommit.put(key, new AddEntry(delegate, key, object));
66    }
67  
68    @Override
69    public Object removeObject(Object key) {
70      entriesToAddOnCommit.remove(key);
71      entriesToRemoveOnCommit.put(key, new RemoveEntry(delegate, key));
72      return delegate.getObject(key);
73    }
74  
75    @Override
76    public void clear() {
77      reset();
78      clearOnCommit = true;
79    }
80  
81    public void commit() {
82      if (clearOnCommit) {
83        delegate.clear();
84      } else {
85        for (RemoveEntry entry : entriesToRemoveOnCommit.values()) {
86          entry.commit();
87        }
88      }
89      for (AddEntry entry : entriesToAddOnCommit.values()) {
90        entry.commit();
91      }
92      reset();
93    }
94  
95    public void rollback() {
96      reset();
97    }
98  
99    private void reset() {
100     clearOnCommit = false;
101     entriesToRemoveOnCommit.clear();
102     entriesToAddOnCommit.clear();
103   }
104 
105   private static class AddEntry {
106     private Cache cache;
107     private Object key;
108     private Object value;
109 
110     public AddEntry(Cache cache, Object key, Object value) {
111       this.cache = cache;
112       this.key = key;
113       this.value = value;
114     }
115 
116     public void commit() {
117       cache.putObject(key, value);
118     }
119   }
120 
121   private static class RemoveEntry {
122     private Cache cache;
123     private Object key;
124 
125     public RemoveEntry(Cache cache, Object key) {
126       this.cache = cache;
127       this.key = key;
128     }
129 
130     public void commit() {
131       cache.removeObject(key);
132     }
133   }
134 
135 }
